mapper.select: SELECT WORK_INSTRUCTION_NO, MRP_GATHERING_NO, ITEM_CODE , ITEM_NAME, INSTRUCTION_DATE, UNIT_OF_WORK_INSTRUCTION , WORK_INSTRUCTION_AMOUNT, PRODUCTION_STATUS, DESCRIPTION , WORK_INSTRUCTION_STATUS FROM PRODUCTION_WORK_INSTRUCTION

SELECT WI.WORK_INSTRUCTION_NO WORK_INSTRUCTION_NO, WI.MRP_GATHERING_NO MRP_GATHERING_NO, WI.ITEM_CODE ITEM_CODE, WI.ITEM_NAME ITEM_NAME, WI.INSTRUCTION_DATE INSTRUCTION_DATE, WI.UNIT_OF_WORK_INSTRUCTION UNIT_OF_WORK_INSTRUCTION, WI.WORK_INSTRUCTION_AMOUNT WORK_INSTRUCTION_AMOUNT, WI.PRODUCTION_STATUS PRODUCTION_STATUS, WI.DESCRIPTION DESCRIPTION, WI.WORK_INSTRUCTION_STATUS WORK_INSTRUCTION_STATUS FROM PRODUCTION_WORK_INSTRUCTION WI, MRP_GATHERING MG WHERE WI.MRP_GATHERING_NO = MG.MRP_GATHERING_NO AND MG.ORDER_OR_PRODUCTION_STATUS='생산' AND PRODUCTION_STATUS='N'
